Sentencas: To develop suitable sealants for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC), glass-ceramics based on the CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 system were studied.
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE), glass transition temperature (T-g) and dilatometric softening point temperature (T-d) of specimens were determined by means of dilatometer analysis and crystallization temperature was measured by differential thermal analysis (DTA).
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Also, crystallization behavior during prolonged heat-treatment and microstructure properties were studied by means of X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM), respectively.
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrical properties were measured at different temperatures, and the results showed a high resistance (>10(4) Omega) at the SOFC operation temperature (600-800 degrees C).
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Moreover, mechanical properties of heat-treated specimens (1, 10, 30, 50 h) were measured.
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Microstructure investigation revealed a well-adhered bonding between the sealant glass-ceramic electrolyte and glass.
Titulo: Evaluation on Properties of CaO-BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
